titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL1563c
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL1563c

encodingDesc.p: The original encoding was done in plain text files following the encoding quidelines of the Morgenländische Gesellschaft. With a dedicated web application these plain text files were transformed into XML documents validating (partially) against the Epidoc-Schema and those XML-Documents have been further sematically annotaded.
In order to avoid well known xml-issues especially in regards of overlapping elements the actual edited/annotated text was multiplied in several anonymos blocks, each block providing specific markup.

Text preserved in this squeeze:
6.in accordance with the judgment of the assembly 7.of ʿUrarat- 8.um. The controller of irrigation is Dādīʾamar. 9. The witnesses (to this legal decision) are 10.Yidhmarʾīl and 11.Muhaqīmum [... ...].
Restored full text of the inscription:
1.[Biyadʾīl and ʿA-] 2.[mmīdharaʾ established their rights of ownership of] 3.[the irrigation of their palm grove] 4.[from this] 5.[irrigation scheme], 6.in accordance with the judgment of the assembly 7.of ʿUrarat- 8.um. The controller of irrigation is Dādīʾamar. 9.The witnesses (to this legal decision) are 10.Yidhmarʾīl and 11.Muhaqīmum [... ...].

Text preserved in this squeeze:
in accordance with the judgment of the assembly
of ʿUrarat-
um. The controller of irrigation is Dādīʾamar.
The witnesses to this legal decision are
Yidhmarʾīl and
Muhaqīmum
.
Restored full text of the inscription:
Biyadʾīl and ʿA-
mmīdharaʾ established their rights of ownership of
the irrigation of their palm grove
from this
irrigation scheme,
in accordance with the judgment of the assembly
of ʿUrarat-
um. The controller of irrigation is Dādīʾamar.
The witnesses to this legal decision are
Yidhmarʾīl and
Muhaqīmum
.
